# Nelson Land & Stump Services

## Summary

Nelson Land & Stump provides professional stump grinding, brush hogging, and land clearing services in Upstate South Carolina. Family-owned business based in Williamston, SC serving Greenville, Anderson, Pickens, and Oconee Counties.

## Contact

- Phone: (864) 760-9203
- Email: tigernelson@gmail.com
- Address: 230 Lewis Road, Williamston, SC 29697

## Services

- Stump Grinding: Professional stump removal, grinding stumps 6-8 inches below ground level. Pricing $75-$400 per stump.
- Brush Hogging: Heavy-duty field mowing and brush clearing for overgrown properties. Pricing $75-$150 per acre.
- Land Clearing: Complete lot clearing for construction, development, or property improvement. Pricing $1,500-$5,000+ per acre.

## Service Areas

Greenville County: Greenville, Simpsonville, Greer, Mauldin, Travelers Rest, Fountain Inn
Anderson County: Anderson, Pendleton, Williamston, Belton, Honea Path, Iva
Pickens County: Easley, Pickens, Clemson, Liberty, Central, Norris
Oconee County: Seneca, Walhalla, Westminster, Salem, West Union, Fair Play
